Title: Secure Your Account and Transactions with Verifying your Identity
Dear valued customer,
We are pleased to inform you that our company has become one of the first in the industry to implement robust authentication and authorization measures. By verifying your identity, we provide you with several benefits such as higher security, faster accounts opening and transactions handling. This change is required due to the passage of various legislation such as Know Your Customer (KYC)/Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Multi-Signature (MS) Directives, which require our customers to execute a verification process at the point of sale (POS).
